```{r, knitr_setup, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  echo = TRUE,
  fig.width = 6,
  fig.asp = 0.618,
  out.width = "70%",
  fig.align = "center",
  dpi = 300
)
options(scipen = 999, digits = 4)
knitr::knit_hooks$set(
  inline = function(x) {
    if (is.numeric(x)) {
      return(prettyNum(x, big.mark = ","))
    } else{
      return(x)
    }
  }
)
```
